TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential sealed beforefieldinit CONNECTDATA extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: Describes a connection that exists to a given connection point.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The `CONNECTDATA` structure is the type enumerated through the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IEnumConnections.Next%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
For more information about `CONNECTDATA`, see the MSDN Library.
The common language runtime throws an exception when a COM method in native code returns an HRESULT. For more information, see [How to: Map HRESULTs and Exceptions](../Topic/How%20to:%20Map%20HRESULTs%20and%20Exceptions.md).

Docs.summary: Represents a connection token that is returned from a call to .
Represents a pointer to the interface on a connected advisory sink. The caller must call on this pointer when the structure is no longer needed.
